entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High 9. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
